name: DHT Holdings, Inc.
description: DHT Holdings, Inc. is a leading provider of oil transportation services through its fleet of crude oil tankers. Founded in 2001 and headquartered in Hamilton, Bermuda, DHT operates a modern fleet of Very Large Crude Carriers (VLCCs) that are equipped with advanced technology to ensure safe and efficient transport of crude oil globally. The company's mission is to provide reliable transportation services while maintaining high safety standards and environmental responsibility. DHT is committed to optimizing its operations and maximizing shareholder value through strategic fleet management and operational excellence. With a focus on long-term sustainability, DHT aims to meet the evolving needs of its customers in the oil and gas industry. The company has a robust chartering strategy, which includes both spot and time charters, allowing it to adjust to market conditions effectively. DHT's commitment to quality and efficiency has established it as a trusted partner in the global energy supply chain.

seo.meta_title: DHT Holdings, Inc. | Leading Oil Transportation Services
seo.meta_description: DHT Holdings, Inc. specializes in oil transportation through its fleet of VLCCs. Discover DHT's commitment to safety, efficiency, and sustainability in the shipping industry.

faq.question: What services does DHT Holdings provide?
faq.answer: DHT Holdings provides oil transportation services through its fleet of Very Large Crude Carriers (VLCCs).

faq.question: Who is the CEO of DHT?
faq.answer: Trygve Munthe is the CEO of DHT Holdings, Inc.

faq.question: Where is DHT Holdings headquartered?
faq.answer: DHT Holdings is headquartered in Hamilton, Bermuda.
